items.title: I love my stylish MOD Easy 3 e-bike and it’s on sale alongside the SideCar models from $2,159
items.summary:
Looking back in on MOD Bikes’ Christmas e-bike sale with rare 10% sitewide savings, I wanted to shine a spotlight on my favorite ride from the brand, the gorgeous Easy 3 e-bike at $2,159 shipped, with the discount automatically applied in your cart. Normally going for $2,399 most of the time, we saw the first discounts since spring pop-up last month during Black Friday, when it fell to $2,199. If you missed out on that pricing, you’re getting an even better deal here with $240 struck from the tag. Of course, this was the brand’s original model to have sidecar attachments, with the Easy 3 SideCar e-bike at $3,509 shipped and the newer Easy SideCar Sahara also at $3,509 shipped – both down from $3,899. There’s also the new Groove SideCar 3 e-bike getting its second-ever discount to $3,149. You learn more about the Easy 3 below, as well as getting my in-depth experience in my hands-on review here.

Over at Amazon you can still pick up the JBL Charge 6 Portable Bluetooth Speaker at $129.95 shipped in almost all its colorways. Normally priced for $200 in full, discounts kept costs above $160 until last month when it fell down to this same rate. It’s been holding strong at this price in all the time since, giving you an extended period to take advantage of the 35% markdown that cuts $70 from the tag for the best tracked price in its history.

Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
Lemon Slice, which launched a 20B-parameter model that creates digital avatars for AI agents, streaming video at 20 FPS on a single GPU, raised a $10.5M seed  —  Developers and companies are increasingly deploying AI agents and chatbots within their apps, but so far they've mostly been restricted to text.

items.title: Cruise up to 44 miles on Segway’s F3 e-scooter with Apple Find My, proximity locking, more for $750
items.summary:
Shining another spotlight on Segway’s ongoing Christmas Holiday EV Sale, commuters needing longer-term support can jump on the F3 Electric Scooter at $749.99 shipped, which also happens to match in price at Amazon. This is one of the brand’s 2025 releases that hit the market back in April for $850, but has since been hiked up to $1,000 directly from Segway since May’s tariff increases – though, you can find it down at that original rate over at Amazon. Before May, we saw discounts go as low as $600, while our post-tariff market has now only seen costs taken as low as $700, which is where we saw it during Black Friday. If you missed out during that event, you can still save $100 off the going rate with this markdown. Head below to learn more.

Two of these are particularly noteworthy as they stand out as the ‘world’s first 6K Glasses-Free 3D’ and the ‘world’s first 1,040Hz Refresh Rate’ models for gaming. items.title: Estella’s top pet deals of the week: Earth Rated gear, up to 50% off grooming supplies, Greenies up to 35% off, more
items.summary:
Alright folks, done it again – she’s put together a list of awesome pet deals you won’t want to miss. There’s no shortage of pet-friendly discounts this week on must-have essentials like pet hair removers, waterproof furniture and car covers, grooming tools, and more. Keeping a clean home is no small task when you have a pet, which is why waterproof blankets and high-quality fur removers are such lifesavers both around the house and in the car, making it easier to stay ahead of the mess as you go. You’ll also find great deals on top pet brands like Native Pet and Greenies, perfect for keeping your furry friends healthy and happy. Many of these items still ship before Christmas, so be sure to grab them now while there’s still time—whether you’re treating your own pet or shopping for a fellow pet lover. Shop the full sale here.

items.title: Rare MOD Bikes Christmas deals offer hundreds in sitewide e-bike savings starting from $1,799
items.summary:
There are six days left to jump on MOD Bikes’ Christmas EV Sale with 10% sitewide savings, which is a rare occurrence these days. Aside from our love of the Easy 3 e-bike and its sidecar counterpart, there are notable second-chance savings hitting the newest MOD Groove SideCar 3 e-bike at $3,149 shipped, while its standalone e-bike model is down at $1,799 shipped. This is the latest sidecar-focused model from the brand that hit the market earlier in the year around the start of summer with a $3,499 full price. The brand stopped offering regular sales after March, with this model seeing its first discount during the Black Friday sale last month, when it dropped to $3,099. Now, you’re looking at the next-best rate with $350 cut from the tag – plus, the brand has promised that if prices drop further before the end of the year, you’ll get a refund for the difference. Head below to learn more about it and the full lineup of deals during MOD Bikes’ Christmas Sale.

For me personally, this is quite possibly the most enticing offer yet on Apple’s 2025 M4 Air lineup, but for some, the 24GB of RAM just won’t cut it and the 256GB internal SSD isn’t even close. items.title: Final Anker SOLIX Xmas flash sale drops C2000 Gen 2 power station + alternator charger to new $969 low, more
items.summary:
As part of its full momentum Christmas Sale, Anker SOLIX has now launched a final 48-hour holiday flash sale through Christmas Eve with up to $5,299 savings across six offers. A notable standout amongst the crowd is the Anker SOLIX C2000 Gen 2 Portable Power Station bundled with an alternator charger at $969 shipped, which beats its Amazon pricing by $80. This station was just released back in October, with this particular bundle joining the lineup of various deals much later, and which we’ve seen brought down from its $2,098 full price to $1,049 at the lowest so far. For only two days, you can score a larger-than-ever 54% markdown that cuts $1,129 off the going rate for the lowest price we have tracked – or pick up the station on its own for nearly $300 less. Head below to learn more about this station and the other offers lasting through Christmas Eve at midnight.
